
### simpler overflow

```c
int giveQuiz() {
    int score = 0;
    char buffer[100];
    for (int i = 0; i &lt; NUM_QUESTIONS; ++i) {
        gets(buffer);
        if (checkAnswer(buffer, &amp;questions[i])) {
            score += 1;
        }
    }
    return score;
}
```

::: {.myoverbox .vlow .fragment fragment-index=2}

going out of bounds of buffer might modify score
